review: Dr. Lohith was professional, attentive, and efficient. The clinic was clean and comfortable, and the care I received was excellent. I highly recommend Lohith Ortho Care for orthopedic services.

Excellent Doctor... I was in terrible back pain due to bad muscle pull. Any movement was giving me so much pain. After I consulted, I got immediate relief of the pain and I was back to my routine the next day.
Very nice and experienced doctorVery Friendly doctor..Treatment is good and explains properly .Keep up the good work
Friendly in nature, listen the problem and gives advice and medicine which makes me feel comfortable and helps a lot in recovery.
